animeTitle: My Wife Is the Empress of the Imperial Dynasty
otherNames: Wo Furen Jing Shi Huangchao Nvdi, My Wife Is the Empress of the Imperial Dynasty, Wǒ Fūrén Jìng Shì Huángcháo Nǚdì, 我夫人竟是皇朝女帝
synopsis: Gu Lan traveled through a fantasy novel and became a supporting role scholar. He also got a beautiful little wife. He wanted to live a peaceful life, relying on the original plot to avoid all kinds of traitors, and stay with his wife for the rest of his life. But he loaded a copybook reading system! As long as he reads and copies books, he can extract his cultivation and become a saint or a god! Because he is too invincible, Gu Lan can easily crush the villain when he goes out, and all the sons and daughters of luck rush to recognize him as his master! While his strength is taking off, his career is also incredibly smooth!
